{foreach from=$helps item=help key=key} {if ($key neq 0) and ($helps[$key]['sort'] neq $helps[$key-1]['sort'])}
{/if} {if ($key eq 0) or ($helps[$key]['sort'] neq $helps[$key-1]['sort'])}
{/if} {if ($helps[$key]['sort'] eq 3) and ($helps[$key]['sort'] neq $helps[$key-1]['sort'])} 常见问题 {/if} {$help.title} {/foreach}
